top_comments.comment: Love this! Now this project seem alot more easier for me to do, but I love all of your projects! Your hands are truly gifted.
You’re truly amazing , so creative in every piece you put together 👏👏 thank you for sharing your talent with us may god bless you
Girl, you’re so talented and gifted! God bless you! You have no idea how brilliant your ideas are…amaazinggg!!!

As always ABSOLUTELY amazingly beautiful. I positively love all the creative ideas. You are such a blessing, 
THANK YOU for sharing your many talents.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Girl, I want to thank you! I love home decor but was done with both HGTV and diy network, neither knows POC exist🙄 I haven't watched in over a year, but I also went looking for POC to watch. Looking on YouTube I find you doing 10,000 times more than what they've been showing, and I'm hooked😍 Everytime I get a notification you are creating something amazing, your creativity is beyond belief. Thank you.
